ygData.subject: Re: Tip for Soloing
ygData.msgSnippet: Just wait until Lvl 20, you ll love the new Force Shock spell.  Does 171 dmg, also think it stun mob too.  Now combine that with Tishan s Clash which does
ygData.messageBody:
Just wait until Lvl 20, you'll love the new Force Shock spell. Does 171
dmg, also think it stun mob too. Now combine that with Tishan's Clash which
does 30dmg but stuns mob like a skeleton might do to you. So hit ti with
171 then 30 plus the stun to get off root Lighting Bolt (because these
spells take a bit to recover from) and you now have done 323 dmg before mob
even gets to you.

Shadair J'Axx
20th Wizard
Karana

> I have used it, and it works well, I cast lightning bolt, then shock of
> fire, doing 223 damage before the mob even gets to me,
>
> Edywen
> Xegony
